title: Fish
creator_credit: Hafiz Zamri and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
brief_description: An allegorical tale of struggle and survival in a competitive world. Filmed in black and white this rather tragic story contains some disturbing scenes. Uses hand-drawn animation, music soundtrack and no commentary.
